In this course we will approach the little and important things that you are unable to do in your day-to-day tasks. In the end, hopefully, some of the knowledge acquired will find a place in your daily work, helping you build better applications with less effort.

events.name: I/O Extended 2017 Coimbra
events.description:
Para confirmares a tua inscri√ß√£o preenche este¬†formul√°rio.¬†


J√° com 10 edi√ß√µes realizadas, o Google I/O √© o evento organizado pela Google para divulgar os √∫ltimos desenvolvimentos no mundo tecnol√≥gico. Em parceria com a WIT Software vamos transmitir a keynote em directo, nas instala√ß√µes da empresa em Taveiro, no dia 17 de Maio pelas 18 horas (no nosso fuso hor√°rio).

Desde j√° est√£o confirmados v√°rios desenvolvimentos em:
- Android O (ainda estamos aqui a contar que seja um "O" de Ovos Moles)
- Google Home (Ok Google, vai fazer-me um caf√©!)
- Android Things (o que acontece se eu ligar este fio vermelho ao...)

events.name: Android Spring Sessions #4 üåª
events.description:
Don't forget to register here.¬†

Session #1 - May 9th ¬ª Android. What else?

Session #2 - May 11th ¬ª Custom Views and ViewGroups

Session #3 ‚Äì May 16th ¬ª Security Hack/Break-Me

Session #4 ‚Äì May 18th ¬ª Sugar rush and how to avoid diabetes

Every year we get a new treat - donuts, kitkats, Marshmallows, Nougats,... the path is already long. We've dealt with brocken API's that have been forgotten, old implementations that have been redesign and new components that are still lost somewhere on support libraries. On this talk were going to give an overview on what new API's are out there and discuss several lessons learned along the path.

Today I learned: - Oooooooh did you know that on Android O you won't need to cast the returned view from findViewById? - Did you ever needed a TextView that would automatically increase/expand according to the available width? - Do want to implement an horizontal scroll view and don't want to create a new component from scratch?

Come join us!

Don't forget to register here.

events.name: Digital meets physical
events.description:
Digital meets physical it's a meetup that gathers product and tech enthusiasts with a bias for IoT, AR, VR, Data and all those digital things that help enhance the physical world.

The event is free but don't forget to confirm your presence!

Speakers:

1. Panayotis Tzinis: Tango Concepts overview¬†

Tango is a platform that uses computer vision to give devices the ability to understand their position relative to the world around them. In this session we will go through the basic concepts, highlighting their functions and we will "play" a little bit with the Lenovo Phab Tango device.¬†

2. M√°rio Antunes: Smart Cloud of Things (SCoT) an IoT/M2M platform

IT Aveiro has been heavily invested in IoT and M2M technology. Not only in the communication layer but also in the analytic potential of these technologies (from collecting data, processing information and visualization). Although many environments are powered by smart¬†solutions, end users do not have a simple way to gather their collective knowledge and program‚Äôs device‚Äôs behaviour. SCoT (Smart Cloud of Things) is the answer developed by IT Aveiro. The architecture builds upon ETSI standards, combined with a rich service execution environment, providing a facilitated orchestration of services and devices, as well as integrated portals for end users access. It was successfully deployed in 3 scenarios: greenhouse monitoring, smart farming, and porthole detection.

More speakers soon!

events.name: GDG Kids
events.description:

Hoje em dia, a inform√°tica invade a vida das pessoas involuntariamente, e √© importante que tamb√©m as crian√ßas, o futuro da evolu√ß√£o tecnol√≥gica, fa√ßam parte desta integra√ß√£o. √â importante que tenham contacto com a tecnologia e que ganhem consci√™ncia de como a devem utilizar. Mentes mais jovens apreendem muito mais facilmente mat√©rias t√©cnicas e o GDG Kids pretende mostrar que a inform√°tica n√£o √© nenhum vil√£o de banda desenhada e que na realidade est√° mais acess√≠vel do que se possa pensar. Temos a certeza que no final deste evento, as crian√ßas se ir√£o sentir verdadeiros her√≥is!

O GDG Kids vai ter lugar no dia 7 de Outubro, na Casa das Artes em Coimbra, e come√ßa √†s 15h00. E para al√©m de uma aula de programa√ß√£o (n√£o precisas de ter qualquer experi√™ncia em programa√ß√£o!) podes contar com outras actividades divertidas:

Playsketch Insufl√°veis Pinturas faciais ... e claro, um lanche refor√ßado para dar energia para toda a tarde! Com o objectivo de conseguirmos dar o maior apoio aos alunos, as inscri√ß√µes est√£o limitadas a 20 vagas - por isso se tens entre 6 e 14 anos inscreve-te j√°!

events.name: DevFest Coimbra 2017
events.description:
DevFest Coimbra‚Äô17 is a technological conference that will be held in Coimbra, on December 9th. Organized by Google Developers Group (GDG) Coimbra, as part of a cycle of international Conferences annually promoted by Google, this event aims to bring the best of technology to the center of Portugal: Coimbra. It‚Äôs the perfect synergy of technological innovation with the city known as the Portuguese capital of knowledge.

Focusing in mobile, web, design and hardware this conference combines talks by renowned speakers with technological stimulating workshops, providing a hands-on-learning opportunity.

Participation on this event has a cost of 5‚Ç¨ for early birds and 10‚Ç¨ after, which will revert entirely to an institution (https://devfest-coimbra.eventbrite.pt)

For more information visit: https://devfest.gdgcoimbra.xyz.

events.name: Global Game Jam¬Æ 2018
events.description:
Est√° de volta a loucura da Global Game Jam. Dizem que √© o maior hackaton de jogos no mundo, dizem que daqui sa√≠ram alguns dos jogos independentes mais jogados nos √∫ltimos anos e dizem de certeza mais coisas umas mais exageradas e outras menos. N√≥s dizemos que as portas da Casa das Artes est√£o abertas para a Global Game Jam desde 2014 e que a cada nova Jam queremos que seja melhor que a anterior.

Para quem √© isto?
Para quem quer fazer jogos. N√£o apenas developers e muito menos s√≥ para game developers. S√£o bem vindas e preciosas as participa√ß√µes de designers, ilustradores, m√∫sicos e contadores de hist√≥rias. Um jogo faz-se a muitas m√£os e com t√£o pouco tempo para fazer um jogo vencedor quantas mais m√£os para p√¥r √† obra melhor.

Como √© que funciona?
Em todo o mundo estar√£o equipas a postos na sexta-feira
√† noite quando sair o tema para a edi√ß√£o deste ano. Depois s√£o 48 horas para submeter um jogo in√©dito. A Casa das Artes vai estar aberta ininterruptamente durante este fim-de-semana e com tudo o que as equipas podem precisar para apenas se concentrarem no desenvolvimento dos jogos, incluindo um s√≠tio para descansarem se precisarem mesmo. Mais informa√ß√µes em http://globalgamejam.org/faq

events.name: Introduction to Unreal Engine 4
events.description:
Required materials:
- Laptop
- Mouse (external)
- Unreal Engine 4 (latest version installed - you can find it here: https://www.unrealengine.com/en-US/blog)

Recommended laptop specs:
- Windows:
(Windows 7/8/10 64-bit, Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster, 8 GB RAM or more, DirectX 11 compatible graphics card)
- Mac OS:
(macOS 10.13 High Sierra, Quad-core Intel, 2.5 GHz or faster, 8 GB RAM, Metal 1.2 Compatible Graphics Card)
- Linux:
(Ubuntu 15.04, Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster, 16 GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or higher with latest NVIDIA binary drivers)

Audience
Game developers, programmers, architects, designers, artists with little or no experience in Unreal. Some programming knowledge is desirable, but not required. The course will be taught in English.

Goal
Learn how to set-up your own project, navigate and work with the Unreal Engine and its editor. Make your own small prototype. Learn how to get started developing your own games, simulations or visualizations using UE4 and Blueprints.

Format
This is a (really) intensive two hour, introductory workshop, taught by Unreal veterans. The goal here is to provide know-how and help you on possible questions for the upcoming Global Gam Jam 2018.

You can find all this information here: https://www.meetup.com/GDG-Coimbra/events/246945917/

events.name: Google Cloud Study Jam - Women In Tech - IoT on Cloud

venue.name: DEI - Department of Computer Science - FCTUC

events.description:
****
This is NOT a women exclusive event.
This event is OPEN TO EVERYONE

However, we have a goal to have less than 50% male present, so if you are one, consider bringing one woman (friend/coworker/etc) with you.
****

At GDG Coimbra we're organizing a Cloud Study Jam event, together with Google and Now What?, focused on Internet of Things.

You will get free access to online training, as well as help from Googlers to learn about the cloud. Even more, you will get free access to these online trainings for 30 more days, so that you can complete your trainings at your convenience.

You can check all this information here:
üëâ https://events.withgoogle.com/csj-for-wit/
üëâ https://www.facebook.com/nowwhatjobs/

ü§î‚ùì What is a Study Jam?
Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers. This is a great opportunity to bring members of your community together to learn something in person.

üë©‚Äçüíªüë®‚Äçüíª How will this work
At the event we‚Äôll use a tool called Qwiklabs, a Google training product. If you have never used Qwiklabs before, save time by creating an account for yourself prior to the class at:
üëâ https://google.qwiklabs.com/users/sign_up
(creating an account is free).

At the event we will give you a link for free Qwiklabs access. Make sure you check the opt-in box for promos! That makes you eligible for additional free access after you complete the first series of labs.

üèéüèÅ Lets Start
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!
Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with IoT on Cloud.
Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to complete any labs you want.

üíªüéß What to bring to the event
1. Laptop -- Mac, PC, Chromebook, Linux, everyone‚Äôs welcome.
2. Laptop charger.
3. Headphones so you can hear privately some online instructions
4. The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, use Firefox or Chrome.

üóìüïê Schedule
14h00 to 18h00

üó∫üìç Host
This event will take place at the Faculty of Informatics Engineering at Universidade of Coimbra.

Looking forward to see you all at the event! üöÄ

--------
Now What?, is an event created and organized by the N√∫cleo de Estudantes de Inform√°tica of the Associa√ß√£o Acad√©mica de Coimbra, that elevates the concept of "job fair", is distinguished by the set of formative, informative and competitive activities that it offers.

events.name: Integrating IoT projects with Google Assistant's Smart Home API

venue.name: DEI - Department of Computer Science - FCTUC

events.description:
At GDG Coimbra we're organizing a second IoT event together with Google and Now What?, focused on Google Assistant's Smart Home API.

We're going to have Orestes Carracedo with us, giving this presentation!

üèéüèÅ Lets Start
So you've put together a couple of IoT projects, and it'd be pretty cool if you were able to control them with your voice, right? In this deep dive we'll go through all the pieces you'll need to integrate your nifty gadgets with the Google Assistant. We'll showcase a neat demo project: a cute Lego house controlled with your voice or via the Google Home app.

We'll start with a light intro to modern IoT prototyping, a simple component architecture for the system, and an we'll take an in-depth look at the Smart Home API integration from Actions on Google.

üóìüïê Schedule
26th of March at 18h00

üó∫üìç Host
This event will take place at the Faculty of Informatics Engineering at Universidade of Coimbra.

Looking forward to see you all at the event! üöÄ

--------

events.name: [Collab Flutter Portugal] Hello Flutter
events.description:
In a collaboration with Flutter Portugal, GDG Coimbra is proud to present this Meetup.

‚úçÔ∏è Description
Welcome to the Flutter community, we work to bring Flutter developers together and welcome new developers. There will be talks, workshops, and showcases, at various cities in Portugal.

üóì Schedule
19:00
Welcome all!

19:15
Miguel Ruivo
Flutter: a revolution in mobile cross-platform development

20:00
Dinner time. Want to come? Please answer here: https://goo.gl/forms/hjw79nCdAD0cDndV2

üó£ Talk
+ Target Audience
Beginner

+ Description
In a world full of cross-platform frameworks promising demanding and fast development while at the same time, trying hard to be capable of accomplishing reactive apps with native performances, Google's framework -- Flutter, despite not being an easy, commits to go a step further amongst them.

+ Biography
Miguel Pereira Ruivo is a Flutter developer, currently at Present Technologies. He graduated as Software Engineer from ISEC - Coimbra Institute of Engineering and have soon become particularly interested in mobile development, along its architectures and technologies. Hence, he soon started working with Android & iOS native SDK, being currently entirely devoted to Flutter Google‚Äôs framework.
Nevertheless, his tech skills go beyond mobile development, being likewise proficient in languages such as Java, Dart, C# and Obj-C, but also in system level ones, namely C and C++, in which he has been training students, as invited teacher, at ISEC‚Äôs and iTGROW‚Äôs partnership course for embedded systems ‚Äî Apostar em TI. Lately, Miguel has also started to be recognised due to his public talks about Flutter.

In his free time, you can find him working out at the gym, travelling the world, delighting himself with his close ones in a sushi restaurant, running up some personal and community Flutter projects or just having a good reading.

üìç Host
Nest will be our host for this Meetup.

üì± Social Networks
Twitter GDG Coimbra: https://twitter.com/GDGCoimbra
Twitter Flutter Portugal: https://twitter.com/FlutterPortugal

group_profile.intro: A strong believer that the answer to life, the universe and everything is 42.
